reviewText: I wanted to purchase this and have the kids watch it with us so they could learn too. I do think it helped.
I rented this from the library and decided I needed to buy this ,  I am a dog trainer and love the Volhards training.
Very simple and clear directions. Helpful info for nice dog owners covers basics like crate training and door manners.

Excellent Video, you will not be disappointed. The Volhard's are definitely animal lovers and it shows thru in this video.  I especially like how they correct the human owners, many time dog trainers are not good at correcting the dog owner.

The Volhards were very concise with their instruction which I needed.  I have never trained a dog before and was very frustrated.  I loved their wisdom that they passed on throughout the  dvd.  As I have learned, that training a dog is a continuing process.  I view these dvds often to refresh myself.  Their training dvds have truly helped me.  Thank you so much!!
This video shows if you put in the work with your puppy...You will have a dog that is well mannered and that can go on to other parts of dog training..........even competition.

watching this video is like a dog training meditation.
helpful and humanitarian ways to train your pup.
Soild advice.
The best Ive seen.

The Volhard method is systematic and logical.  The various commands of sit, down, sit/stay down/stay are broken down so that anyone can understand.  The gentle ways of the Volhards make it enjoyable to listen and to practice.  My dog has learned through this technique and it works.  Lots of other useful commentary for the beginner and veteran dog owner. Highly recommended.

This DVD's gives an interesting course in several lessons about dog training and education. Of course, the Volhard couple try to promote their non-violent form to develop dog's possibilities. ABSOLUTELY NECCESARY for everyone who has a dog problem at home. Granted.
